languages.text: "Порой неведение есть настоящее счастье, дитя. Но я не могу лишить тебя права знать истину". {n}Провидец вскидывает голову, и голос его гремит подобно раскатам грома.{/n} "Оказавшись среди светил сего звездного полотна, мы наткнулись на корабль мон-кай. Слишком ничтожный, чтобы совладать с миром Детей Азуриана... так мы думали. Пока совет не постигло видение грядущего ужаса: сей корабль станет погибелью! Не только для Крудараха, но для всех сородичей-эльдаров, что оказались средь местных звезд. И даже тех, чьи пути простираются много дальше..."

traits.locale_text: "Порой неведение есть настоящее счатье, дитя. Но я не могу лишить тебя права знать истину". {n}Провидец оборачивается к вам, и голос его звучит, словно раскаты грома.{/n} "Оказавшись среди звезд сего звездного полотна, мы наткнулись на корабль мон-кай. Слишком ничтожный, чтобы совладать с целым миром Детей Азуриана — так мы думали. Без объявления войны и переговоров, мон-кай выпустили в Крударах примитивный снаряд... принесли раздор на наш мир, заразив его чумой, что разъедала саму плоть корабля!"

"Порой неведение есть настоящее счастье, дитя. Но я не могу лишить тебя права знать истину". {n}Провидец вскидывает голову, и голос его гремит подобно раскатам грома.{/n} "Оказавшись среди светил сего звездного полотна, мы наткнулись на корабль мон-кай. Слишком ничтожный, чтобы совладать с миром Детей Азуриана... так мы думали. Пока совет не постигло видение грядущего ужаса: сей корабль станет погибелью! Не только для Крудараха, но для всех сородичей-эльдаров, что оказались средь местных звезд. И даже тех, чьи пути простираются много дальше..."

languages.text: "Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."
languages.original_text: "Порой неведение есть настоящее счастье, дитя. Но я не могу лишить тебя права знать истину". {n}Провидец вскидывает голову, и голос его гремит подобно раскатам грома.{/n} "Оказавшись среди светил сего звездного полотна, мы наткнулись на корабль мон-кай. Слишком ничтожный, чтобы совладать с миром Детей Азуриана... так мы думали. Пока совет не постигло видение грядущего ужаса: сей корабль станет погибелью! Не только для Крудараха, но для всех сородичей-эльдаров, что оказались средь местных звезд. И даже тех, чьи пути простираются много дальше..."

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

"Sometimes ignorance really is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer turns to you, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder.{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an entire Asuryani world — or so we thought. With no declaration of war and no parley, the mon-keigh fired a primitive missile at Crudarach... bringing strife to our world — infecting it with a pest that gnawed at the craft's very flesh!"

"Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

"Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer turns to you, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an entire Asuryani world — or so we thought. With no declaration of war and no parley, the mon-keigh fired a primitive missile on Crudarach... bringing strife to our world — infecting it with a pest that gnawed at the craftworld's very flesh!"

"Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

"Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

languages.text: «A veces la ignorancia da la felicidad, joven. Pero no puedo negarte el derecho a saber la verdad». {n}El vidente echa atrás la cabeza y su voz retumba como el trueno:{/n} «Cuando nos encontramos entre las estrellas del tejido astral, nos cruzamos con una nave mon-keigh. Una nave demasiado insignificante como para luchar contra un mundo Asuryani... o eso creíamos. Hasta que el consejo recibió una visión que revelaba el horror futuro: ¡esta nave sería nuestra condena! No solo para Crudarach, sino para todos los Aeldari en las estrellas cercanas. Y para todos cuyos caminos van mucho más allá de las estrellas...».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

traits.locale_text: «A veces la ignorancia da la felicidad, joven. Pero no puedo negarte el derecho a saber la verdad». {n}El vidente echa atrás la cabeza y su voz retumba como el trueno:{/n} «Cuando nos encontramos entre las estrellas del tejido astral, nos cruzamos con una nave mon-keigh. Una nave demasiado insignificante como para luchar contra un mundo Asuryani... o eso creíamos. Hasta que el consejo recibió una visión que revelaba el horror futuro: ¡esta nave sería nuestra condena! No solo para Crudarach, sino para todos los Aeldari en las estrellas cercanas. Y para todos cuyos caminos van mucho más allá de las estrellas...».

languages.text: 「時に、無知は至福の時となるんだよ、我が子よ。だがお前が真実を知る権利を、私が否定することはできない」{n}先見司はあなたに向き直り、雷鳴のような声を響かせている。{/n}「我々がこの広大な星々の中を漂っていた時、モン＝ケイの船に遭遇した。アシュリヤーニの惑星全体と戦うには、あまりにもちっぽけな船だと…我々がそう思っていた。評議会が、この船が我等に破滅をもたらすという、来るべき恐怖の予見を見るまでは！それはクルダラにいる我々だけでなく、近隣の星々に住まうすべてのアエルダリに、そしてその彼方の航路の先にある者にとっても…」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

traits.locale_text: 「時に、無知は至福の時となるんだよ、我が子よ。だがお前が真実を知る権利を、私が否定することはできない」{n}先見司はあなたに向き直り、雷鳴のような声を響かせている。{/n}「我々がこの広大な星々の中を漂っていた時、モン＝ケイの船に遭遇した。アシュリヤーニの惑星全体と戦うには、あまりにもちっぽけな船だと…我々がそう思っていた。評議会が、この船が我等に破滅をもたらすという、来るべき恐怖の予見を見るまでは！それはクルダラにいる我々だけでなく、近隣の星々に住まうすべてのアエルダリに、そしてその彼方の航路の先にある者にとっても…」

languages.text: “有的时候无知真的是福，我的孩子，但我无权否决你了解真相的权利。”{n}先知头向后一甩，声音听起来像隆隆的雷声。{/n}“当我们在这片恒星的群星之中时，我们遭遇了一艘猴子的飞船。那艘船非常渺小，根本无法对整个方舟世界构成威胁……或者说，我们原本是这么以为的。然而，议会的先知却看到了可怕的景象——那艘飞船将会为我们带来毁灭！它不仅仅会毁灭克鲁达拉赫的所有艾达灵族，还会毁灭附近星系的所有族人。就连那些遥远群星的同胞，也无法逃过它的魔爪……”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

traits.locale_text: “有的时候无知真的是福，我的孩子，但我无权否决你了解真相的权利。”{n}先知头向后一甩，声音听起来像隆隆的雷声。{/n}“当我们在这片恒星的群星之中时，我们遭遇了一艘猴子的飞船。那艘船非常渺小，根本无法对整个方舟世界构成威胁……或者说，我们原本是这么以为的。然而，议会的先知却看到了可怕的景象——那艘飞船将会为我们带来毁灭！它不仅仅会毁灭克鲁达拉赫的所有艾达灵族，还会毁灭附近星系的所有族人。就连那些遥远群星的同胞，也无法逃过它的魔爪……”

languages.text: « Parfois, l'ignorance est véritablement une bénédiction, mon enfant. Mais je ne peux vous refuser le droit de connaître la vérité. » {n}Le Grand Prophète rejette la tête en arrière et sa voix se fait tempétueuse :{/n} « Lorsque nous nous sommes retrouvés parmi les étoiles de ce système, nous avons fait face à un vaisseau mon-keigh. Un vaisseau bien trop petit pour se mesurer à un monde asuryani tout entier. Du moins, c'est ce que nous pensions... Jusqu'à ce que le conseil soit frappé par une vision du cauchemar à venir et comprenne que ce bâtiment scellerait notre perte ! Pas seulement celle de Crudarach, mais aussi de tous les Aeldaris des étoiles voisines, sans oublier ceux dont la voie s'étendait bien au-delà de la galaxie... »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

traits.locale_text: « Parfois, l'ignorance est véritablement une bénédiction, mon enfant. Mais je ne peux vous refuser le droit de connaître la vérité. » {n}Le Grand Prophète rejette la tête en arrière et sa voix se fait tempétueuse :{/n} « Lorsque nous nous sommes retrouvés parmi les étoiles de ce système, nous avons fait face à un vaisseau mon-keigh. Un vaisseau bien trop petit pour se mesurer à un monde asuryani tout entier. Du moins, c'est ce que nous pensions... Jusqu'à ce que le conseil soit frappé par une vision du cauchemar à venir et comprenne que ce bâtiment scellerait notre perte ! Pas seulement celle de Crudarach, mais aussi de tous les Aeldaris des étoiles voisines, sans oublier ceux dont la voie s'étendait bien au-delà de la galaxie... »

languages.text: "Manchmal ist Unwissenheit tatsächlich ein Segen, mein Kind. Aber ich kann Euch nicht Euer Recht absprechen, die Wahrheit zu erfahren." {n}Der Runenprophet wirft seinen Kopf in den Nacken und seine Stimme klingt wie ein Donnergrollen:{/n} "Als wir durch dieses Sternengefüge reisten, trafen wir auf ein Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff. Das Schiff war viel zu klein, um es mit einer Asuryani-Welt aufzunehmen – dachten wir jedenfalls. Bis den Rat eine Vision des nahenden Schreckens ereilte. Dieses Schiff würde unser Verderben sein. Allerdings nicht nur für uns auf Crudarach, sondern für sämtliche Aeldari auf den umliegenden Sternen. Ja, selbst für jene, deren Wege weit jenseits der Sterne verliefen ..."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal ist Unwissenheit tatsächlich ein Segen, mein Kind. Aber ich kann Euch nicht Euer Recht absprechen, die Wahrheit zu erfahren." {n}Der Runenprophet wendet sich dir zu und seine Stimme klingt wie ein Donnergrollen:{/n} "Als wir durch dieses Sternengefüge reisten, trafen wir auf ein Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff. Das Schiff war viel zu klein, um es mit einer ganzen Asuryani-Welt aufzunehmen – dachten wir zumindest. Ohne jegliche Kriegserklärung und Verhandlung feuerten die Chem-Pan-Sey eine primitive Rakete auf Crudarach ab ... und brachten so Unheil über unsere Welt – indem sie sie mit einer Seuche infizierten, die das Fleisch des Weltenschiffs selbst angriff!"

languages.text: "Bazen cehalet gerçekten de mutluluktur çocuğum. Ancak hakikati bilme hakkını inkâr edemem." {n}Ötesezen, başını geriye yatırıyor. Sesi, kulağa âdeta gümbürdeyen bir fırtına gibi geliyor.{/n} "Kendimizi bu semavi dokudaki yıldızların arasında bulduğumuzda bir mon-keigh gemisiyle karşılaştık. Bir Asuryani dünyasını alt edemeyecek kadar güçsüz bir gemiydi. En azından biz öyle düşünmüştük. Ta ki konsey, bizi bekleyen dehşetle dolu bir görüyle sarsılana dek... Bu gemi, bizim felaketimiz olacaktı! Yalnızca Crudarach'taki bizlerin değil, aynı zamanda yakınlardaki yıldızların arasına dağılan tüm Aeldari soydaşlarımız için... Hatta yolları yıldızların bile ötesine uzananlar için..."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes ignorance truly is bliss, my child. But I cannot deny you your right to know the truth." {n}The Farseer tosses back his head, and his voice sounds like rolling thunder:{/n} "When we found ourselves amid the stars of this stellar fabric, we encountered a mon-keigh ship. A ship much too puny to take on an Asuryani world... or so we thought. Until the council was struck with a vision of the horror to come: this ship would be our doom! Not only for us on Crudarach, but for all Aeldari kind among the nearby stars. And even for those whose paths stretched far beyond the stars..."

Sesi, kulağa âdeta gümbürdeyen bir fırtına gibi geliyor.{/n} "Kendimizi bu semavi dokudaki yıldızların arasında bulduğumuzda bir mon-keigh gemisiyle karşılaştık. Bir Asuryani dünyasını alt edemeyecek kadar güçsüz bir gemiydi. En azından biz öyle düşünmüştük. Ta ki konsey, bizi bekleyen dehşetle dolu bir görüyle sarsılana dek... Bu gemi, bizim felaketimiz olacaktı! Yalnızca Crudarach'taki bizlerin değil, aynı zamanda yakınlardaki yıldızların arasına dağılan tüm Aeldari soydaşlarımız için... Hatta yolları yıldızların bile ötesine uzananlar için..."
